subject: Talk as if live.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_66b1_7beb_3a5b

The tape was recorded on July 14th, but I bought the pizzas this morning. I 
have some ghosts here that like pizza, and they request it.

Frank-s
